column1: Walter sent: “Hello. I’ve got Faceblock and Instantgam. I’m too old for the other ones.”
Saul sent: “I’m on LankedOn for Business. And I have an Instantgam account for my cats. Oh
Jesse sent: “Yo! I’ve got ‘em all. Tooter
Gus sent: “I use Tooter and Instantgam. My customers aren’t on the others
column2: so I can’t get them to engage with my brand there.”
